title: Need help fixing my client pls.
body:
I am trying to update/re download my launcher but getting a bug splat/Crash everytime it gets to around 2mb. I have tried things like disabling firewall etc. Any ideas as to why it isnt working?


https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/541140108741574658/600823487350702081/unknown.png

replies.body: Yeah I made a ticket aswell :/

Tech isn't my area, but the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) may be able to find and clear out any old files causing problems.

Failing that, I'd recommend submitting a ticket to Player Support as they are much more familiar with the myriad of things that can go wrong. There appears to be a high volume of tickets at the moment so please be patient when waiting for a response.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
I also am experiencing the same issue with the same error pop up
